en: Musician! You're back from your travels! As you can see your homeland is not what it used to be... please, [do shake_camera()][shake rate=30 level=20]help us with your music![/shake]
Wait, I'm a musician, not a warrior! How do you expect me to battle?
We have discovered that these creatures hate music, so you're the only one equipped for this!
Oh, and someone I just met told me you have to push 'X' to play your music? Whatever that means...
